    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [// Testing CPD suppression]            1         27
L3
    [// Irrelevant comment]                 1         22
L4
    [// CPD-OFF]                            1         11
L7
    [case]                                  1         5
    [class]                                 6         11
    [Foo]                                   12        15
    [(]                                     15        16
    [)]                                     16        17
    [{]                                     18        19
    [// special multiline comments]         20        49
L9
    [/* CPD-OFF\n  *\n  *\n  * */]          3         7
L14
    [private]                               3         10
    [def]                                   11        14
    [bar]                                   15        18
    [(]                                     18        19
    [i]                                     19        20
    [:]                                     20        21
    [Int]                                   22        25
    [)]                                     25        26
    [:]                                     27        28
    [Int]                                   29        32
    [=]                                     33        34

L15
    [val]                                   5         8
    [CPD]                                   9         12

    [40]                                    15        17

    [val]                                   5         8

    [-]                                     8         9

    [// This should tokenize]               15        38

    [}]                                     3         4
L20
    [/* CPD-OFF */]                         3         16
